N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5122.2 - Deposits into capital investments account

State Regulations
(a) Deposits. Each video gaming agent shall
be responsible to deposit the portion of its vendor fee set forth in Tax Law
section 1612(b)(1) daily into a segregated capital investments account
restricted for the collection and authorized use of such funds. (b) Account statements. Each agent shall
provide monthly bank statements for the segregated capital investments account
to the commission for independent verification of deposits and withdrawals from
the account. (c) Loss or theft. The
commission is not responsible for the loss or theft of any money in any account
to which capital investments funds are deposited. Notes
